Minecraft Pi Edition A “Raspberry Pi” is a small mini PC that you can buy for less than 40 euros. Despite the low price and the weak hardware, the small computer can be a useful helper.

Minecraft Pi: Play Minecraft for free on the Raspberry Pi

In order to install Minecraft, you need the Raspbian operating system. Once played on the SD card, you can actually get started. After you have downloaded the “Minecraft Pi Edition”, simply navigate to the downloads folder and open a command line.

Now you need to enter these commands one by one:

  • tar -zxvf minecraft-pi-0.1.1.tar.gz
  • cd mcpi
  • minecraft pi

Now Minecraft will start and you are good to go.

Minecraft in the “Pi Edition” actually only becomes interesting with the “Python Programming Interface”, with which you can reprogram the game world live. You can learn how this works with the Minecraft: Pi Edition Coding How-to Ebook.
